cookingTips: Handle ground beef gently when mixing to avoid tough, dense burgers
Form patties slightly larger than burger buns as they shrink when cooking
Grill over medium-high heat and avoid pressing down on patties
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand how to mix ingredients without overworking the meat, and guide them through grilling to the right temperature while keeping them juicy.
